show_name: Yuusha ni Narenakatta Ore wa Shibushibu Shuushoku wo Ketsui Shimashita. OVA
other_title: I Couldn't Become a Hero, So I Reluctantly Decided to Get a Job. OVA
Yusibu: I couldn't become a hero, so I reluctantly decided to get a job. OVA
勇者になれなかった俺はしぶしぶ就職を決意しました。OVA
opening_theme: "Extra Revolution (エキストラレボリューション)" by KANBAN Musume (KANBAN娘; Azusa Tadokoro, Maina Shimagata, Emi Nitta, Madoka Sowa, Natsumi Yamada, Kanae Iwasaki, & Kumi Takaragi)
